snippet: The daughter of a traumatized war veteran must care for her father and survive senior year in Laurie Halse Anderson’s novel.
abstract: Jo Knowles reviews book The Impossible Knife of Memory by Laurie Halse Anderson.
lead_paragraph: The daughter of a traumatized war veteran must care for her father and survive senior year in Laurie Halse Anderson’s novel.

headline.seo: Laurie Halse Anderson’s ‘Impossible Knife of Memory’
